import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import LogoTitle from '../../assets/images/logo-hb.png' import Logo from './Logo' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = [' ', 'H', 'w', 'a', 'n', 'g', 'b', 'o', ' ', 'G', 'y', 'u', 'm', 'i', 'n'] const jobArray = [ 'B', 'a', 'c', 'k', 'e', 'n', 'd', ' ', 'd', 'e', 'v', 'e', 'l', 'o', 'p', 'e', 'r', ] useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>

H i,
I 'm

Backend Developer / Blockchain Expert

CONTACT ME
) } export default Home
